channel.title: Octopress on joh.fi
channel.description: Recent content in Octopress on joh.fi

item.title: Fresh new look
item.description: As you can see the site has a new fresh and responsive look. :)

item.title: Migration to Octopress
item.description: Brace yourselves, it’s time for another “I migrated from X to octopress” blog post. Try to bear with me. Like the title hints I have finally started my migration process from wordpress to octopress. I have nothing against wordpress per se but it’s way too big for my needs. I only need a simple way of creating posts every now and then and for that purpose octopress seems to be quite suitable.
